thread.section_title: Fitness Superstore, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fitness Superstore, Inc. | www.fitnesssuperstore.com
thread.title: CJH
thread.title_full: Fitness Superstore, Inc. reviewed by CJH

author: CJH
title: CJH
text: Our experience with Fitness Superstore was excellent from start to finish. They really know their machines and recommended two that fit our needs perfectly. The home delivery was professional and friendly, and the machines that we got look and perform like new. We'd definitely do business with this company again.
